[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1612503450057{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}” add_extended=”true” values=”%5B%7B%22extended_animation%22%3A%22particles%22%2C%22figure_color%22%3A%22%23ffffff%22%2C%22drop_colors%22%3A%22random_colors%22%2C%22part_color%22%3A%22%23ff7e00%22%2C%22part_color_1%22%3A%22%23ff7e00%22%2C%22part_color_2%22%3A%22%233224e9%22%2C%22part_color_3%22%3A%22%2369e9f2%22%2C%22extended_animation_pos_vertical%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22extended_animation_pos_horizont%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22sphere_width%22%3A%22100%22%2C%22particles_number%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22particles_size%22%3A%2210%22%2C%22particles_speed%22%3A%222%22%2C%22hover_anim%22%3A%22grab%22%2C%22parallax_dir%22%3A%22vertical%22%2C%22parallax_factor%22%3A%220.3%22%2C%22particles_position_top%22%3A%220%22%2C%22particles_position_left%22%3A%220%22%2C%22particles_width%22%3A%22100%22%2C%22particles_height%22%3A%22100%22%7D%5D”][vc_column][wgl_double_headings align=”center” css_animation=”bounceIn” title_color=”#252525″ subtitle_color=”#ff7d00″ title=”Full Service Design Service Agency”][vc_column_text css_animation=”bounceInUp”]

Aarvy Technologies is a full service design services provider based in Delhi with a proven track record of enhancing brand/product identity through stunning design offerings that evoke interest and buyer engagement.

We offer advertising design, graphic design, collateral design, logo design, packaging design and print design solutions that enhance the persona of your product. As a ambitious business unit, you would like your products as well as business to have an online personality that meshes well with your offerings.

With creative designs, proper consultation and execution in place, you can count on us for objective and highly engaging campaigns that help you reach out to your target customers with increased efficacy.

[/vc_column_text][wgl_double_headings title_color=”#252525″ subtitle_color=”#ff7d00″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1612356028044{background-color: #efefef !important;}”][vc_row content_placement=”middle” add_extended=”true” values=”%5B%7B%22extended_animation%22%3A%22particles%22%2C%22figure_color%22%3A%22%23ffffff%22%2C%22drop_colors%22%3A%22random_colors%22%2C%22part_color%22%3A%22%23ff7e00%22%2C%22part_color_1%22%3A%22%23ff7e00%22%2C%22part_color_2%22%3A%22%233224e9%22%2C%22part_color_3%22%3A%22%2369e9f2%22%2C%22extended_animation_pos_vertical%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22extended_animation_pos_horizont%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22sphere_width%22%3A%22100%22%2C%22particles_number%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22particles_size%22%3A%2210%22%2C%22particles_speed%22%3A%222%22%2C%22hover_anim%22%3A%22grab%22%2C%22parallax_dir%22%3A%22vertical%22%2C%22parallax_factor%22%3A%220.3%22%2C%22particles_position_top%22%3A%220%22%2C%22particles_position_left%22%3A%220%22%2C%22particles_width%22%3A%22100%22%2C%22particles_height%22%3A%22100%22%7D%5D”][vc_column width=”2/3″][wgl_double_headings css_animation=”bounceIn” title_color=”#252525″ subtitle_color=”#ff7d00″ title=”Packaging Design Solutions Offered At Aarvy Technology”][vc_column_text css_animation=”lightSpeedIn”]

Whether it’s retail packaging or industrial one, packaging design is one of the core components, you just cannot overlook. As a retail business, your product is up against zillions of products out there on the shelves and hence an eye-catchy and yet interesting design can take your business a long way. In the industrial arena buying decisions are also determined by designs as much as by features and benefits they have to offer to the buyers.

At Aarvy Technology, from ideation to execution, we leverage our years of experience and creative outlook to create stunning packaging persuading enough for your customers to buy your products.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”2343″ img_size=”full” css_animation=”appear”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1612356484030{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInRightBig” add_extended=”true” values=”%5B%7B%22extended_animation%22%3A%22particles%22%2C%22figure_color%22%3A%22%23ffffff%22%2C%22drop_colors%22%3A%22random_colors%22%2C%22part_color%22%3A%22%23ff7e00%22%2C%22part_color_1%22%3A%22%23ff7e00%22%2C%22part_color_2%22%3A%22%233224e9%22%2C%22part_color_3%22%3A%22%2369e9f2%22%2C%22extended_animation_pos_vertical%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22extended_animation_pos_horizont%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22sphere_width%22%3A%22100%22%2C%22particles_number%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22particles_size%22%3A%2210%22%2C%22particles_speed%22%3A%222%22%2C%22hover_anim%22%3A%22grab%22%2C%22parallax_dir%22%3A%22vertical%22%2C%22parallax_factor%22%3A%220.3%22%2C%22particles_position_top%22%3A%220%22%2C%22particles_position_left%22%3A%220%22%2C%22particles_width%22%3A%22100%22%2C%22particles_height%22%3A%22100%22%7D%5D”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”2346″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css_animation=”zoomInUp”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Aarvy Technology specializes in adding visual impact with bouts of creative thoughts infused while coming up with advertising and marketing collateral designing solutions that adds that much needed elevation your business needs.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]
  • Magazines
  • Brochures
  • Business visiting cards
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]
